The dress's stretchiness is appreciated, with one mentioning it's perfect for dancing. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally Recommend ðŸ˜
items.body: I'm 5'3", 172 lbs, and wear a 38C bra â€” and this navy blue dress fit me beautifully! I ordered size medium and was so happy with how well it flattered my figure. It hugged in all the right places without being too tight, and the fabric has a nice stretch that made it super comfortable to wear all day. I wore it to my friend's wedding and got so many compliments! The navy color is rich and elegant, and the length was perfect for vertically challenged gals like myself. I felt confident and stylish without having to fuss with the dress at all. If youâ€™re curvy and petite like me, I highly recommend this dress. Great fit, great quality, and a great price!! Read more
items.author: Marie M Lopez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars a stunner
items.body: this dress is just perfect. very comfortable and you can wear a bra! it fit my body in such a good way. the slit is awesome. i got 3 for a black tie wedding last minute. was hoping i'd only like maybe like 1, but i loved all 3. was not an easy decision. i didn't go with this one, just because i would have needed to cut it (which i do sometimes) since i'm a shorty. haven't decided if i'll keep or not, just cause i'm a poor teacher and i shouldn't. but I LOVE IT and i want to wear it somewhere. i feel like it's just the perfect black dress. the material is super comfy, not crazy thick, but when you put it on, it feels just right. should i keep it? where is that rich aunt who wants to buy me everything:)? Read more
items.author: Nina B. Gettes

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dress-navy blue
items.body: True to size and the material is stretchy. I am 5 months pregnant and it fit well and complimented my growing belly. Good quality because it stretched to fit now and will fit after I have baby. Very good quality dress for date night. Read more
items.author: Megan Stacy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Flattering, and Comfortable â€” Perfect Holiday Dress ðŸ’šâœ¨
items.body: First offâ€”the color. This deep emerald green is stunning. Itâ€™s rich, elegant, and honestly one of those shades that looks amazing under holiday lighting. Against Christmas dÃ©cor, especially golds and reds, it really pops without being loud. Now letâ€™s talk fit, because this is where the dress really shines. The fabric hugs in all the right places without feeling tight or uncomfortable. It smooths everything out, gives a flattering silhouette, and still lets you move, sit, and breatheâ€”which is non-negotiable for me. The V-neckline is tasteful but feminine, and the wrap-style front gives shape without overexposing anything. The side slit is such a good detail. It adds just enough drama and movement without being too much. You get that confident, elegant vibe when you walk, but it still feels classy and appropriate for a holiday party or formal event. Comfort-wiseâ€”this dress is a win. I wore it for hours and never felt like I needed to adjust it or rush home to change. The material has a nice weight to it, so it drapes beautifully and doesnâ€™t cling in a weird way. It feels structured but forgiving, which we love. Overall, this is one of those dresses that makes you feel put together, confident, and festive without trying too hard. Itâ€™s perfect for Christmas parties, winter weddings, or any dressy night where you want to feel elegant but still like yourself. Read more
items.author: Trish

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a wedding!
items.body: I loved this dress for my brothers wedding. I wore a shall as it was cold out but it fit well, looked classy and elegant. It was very comfortable. I had ordered multiple sizes as evening dresses tend to fit differently. Iâ€™m typically a medium in regular clothing but I kept the Large for this dress. The medium was too tight in the breast area. The Large was perfect. Read more
items.author: Brittany Smith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit short
items.body: I ordered a large in 2 colors and it was short. The rest of the dress fit perfectly though. I'm 5'7", 160, 34D. Nice material, flattering rouching, and the slit wasn't out of control. I wish it was longer because it is beautiful! Read more
items.author: clever1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Mother of the Groom Dress
items.body: Bought this dress for my son's wedding. I have never received so many complements on a dress. This dress was perfect in every way. Fabric was great quality. It was not too thick or thin. The neckline was flattering and not too revealing. Fit perfectly... length, waist, and bust. Had a good amount of stretch. Read more
items.author: Michelle R.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best dress out of 6 I tried!
items.body: This dress fit great unlike other dresses from the same product line. It did have 1 slight issue in the front where the dress sits across cleavage. I did not care because I'd already sent back 4 other dresses and this was a backup! It won't seem very wrinkled but look at it in the light and they're probably present so be sure to steam it before you wear it. It's the type of material that changes color as you steam so you'll need to steam the entire dress, not just the wrinkled areas. I'd like to note that although it's definitely a polyester and you might think how is this cheap material okay for a formal event. Well everyone is wearing it now so you won't stand out as wearing a cheap dress. Once upon a time nicer fabrics for formal dresses were readily available. Sadly this isn't the case. Even department stores are selling this polyester material in their formal wear, so it will do in a pinch and for a dress under $80. I'm 5ft 4inches and with 4inch platform heels it was perfect. If you're my height you'll need at least a 3inch heel. I did notice depending on the style of dress they came in different lengths. This brand is definitely not paying close attention to detail m, however they probably have a dress that will work for you. I tried their scoop neck and that was a nightmare. I also tried the dress that had ruffles only on one shoulder and it drove me nuts just while trying on. If it had the ruffles on both sides I would have been able to ignore it. With just one shoulder have the flutter sleve it made me feel like something was touching me. Another positive about this particular dress is that it did not go down it the back so much that my bra showed. The "cleavage" was minimal so I felt covered enough to still be classy. Note all the photos are from the end of the night. (I'm so bad at remembering to take photos!) Also I know ruching is supposed to camouflage the tummy. However Mayne I could have fit a size S so it wouldn't be so loose across the tummy. That's my major complaint with the dress and I remembered as I posted these photos. It doesn't look as flattering as it did earlier in the night as well. Perhaps it both stretched out and I could have worn a size S. Although my boobs probably wouldn't fit right in the S. I'm a bit embarrassed by the photos but wanted to show the dress. It's not like this is social media right. ðŸ˜† Anyways hopefully the pics show that the dress is a bit modest adjacent especially for the style. The slit isn't to high and makes you feel a bit sexy! I did pink with Navy blue because I found out the theme was spring. So added some spring pink with a purse and shoes. Oh the heels are dream pairs. They're so very comfortable too! I have a bad ankle and could wear then with my brace! This dress was the winner out of 6 dresses I tried! Oh, I'm 5ft 4in, 34 DDD (the dress wasn't too tight in chest,) 39 inch hip. I got the size M. I hope this helps! Read more
items.author: Stephanie G.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Cocktail Split Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Evening Cocktail Split Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Burgundy, Magenta, Royal Blue, Black, Teal Blue, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
